item.title: ITUB
item.description: score:50 Chances: Increased operating revenues and managerial financial margin are partially offset by escalating costs for Itau Unibanco (ITUB) in fourth-quarter 2023. ITAÃš UNIBANCO HOLDING S.A. informs its stockholders that the Board of Directors, meeting on February 5, 2024, has resolved to release its projections for the year 2024.
